settings.ctm_description: Made from grass-fed beef tallow, this single-ingredient moisturizer nourishes deeply, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and radiant.

settings.content: I've always been wary of conventional skin care products due to their long list of unrecognizable ingredients. I feel very fortunate to have found this product. Thank you for bringing it to market!

settings.title: Skincare Stories That Glow
settings.subtitle: Transforming routines and delivering real results

settings.title: Nourishing Benefits of Super Tallow™
settings.subtitle: Unlike synthetic moisturisers, Super Tallow™ is crafted from 100% grass-fed tallow, delivering deep hydration and natural care for your skin.

settings.text: Deep Hydration, Gentle on All Skin

settings.title: Pump
settings.content: Dispense a pea-sized amount of Super Tallow™ into your hands. The convenient pump ensures mess-free application every time.

settings.title: Warm & Apply
settings.content: Gently warm the tallow between your palms to activate its silky texture, then massage it into clean, dry skin in circular motions for even coverage.

settings.title: Glow
settings.content: Allow 5-10 minutes for the tallow to fully absorb, leaving your skin deeply hydrated, soft, and glowing with a natural radiance.

settings.title: Our Purposeful Mission
settings.content: At Momona, we’re redefining skincare by embracing simplicity, sustainability, and the power of natural ingredients. Super Tallow™ isn’t just a moisturiser—it’s a commitment to self-care that’s clean, effective, and luxurious.

Vitamins A, D, E, and K

Essential for skin regeneration, hydration, and elasticity.

Omega Fatty Acids

To deeply nourish and repair your skin’s natural barrier.

settings.title: One ingredient. Endless benefits.
settings.content: At the core of Super Tallow™ is 100% grass-fed beef tallow, a single, powerhouse ingredient packed with:

settings.question: What is tallow?
settings.answer: Tallow is a single-ingredient moisturizer that has been used for thousands of years. It is sourced from the fatty tissue of cows, and is rich in vitamins A, D, E, and K. Tallow has a lipid profile similar to that of human skin, so it is easily absorbed and nourishing to the skin barrier.

settings.question: What makes Super Tallow™ "super"?
settings.answer: Super Tallow™ is incredibly high quality tallow. It has a luxe texture & consistency, is 100% unscented, and is sourced from the best sustainable farms. We believe that grass-fed, grass-finished, happy cows make the best tallow. If you have tried other tallow products, you will see a night and day difference versus Super Tallow™.

settings.question: Does it have a smell?
settings.answer: No! Our tallow is completely unscented. You may pick up a 'beefy' scent using other tallow products, but not Super Tallow™.

settings.question: Does it cause breakouts?
settings.answer: No! Tallow is non-comedogenic, meaning is does not clog pores.

settings.question: When should I use it?
settings.answer: Any time your skin feels like it needs nourishment or is dry. Fit it into your daily routine however works best for you - some people love Super Tallow™ in their morning routine, some in their evening routine, and some in both!

settings.question: How should I store it?
settings.answer: Tallow is naturally shelf-stable at room temperature, and does not need to be refrigerated. The texture & consistency will change in cold & heat, so try to store it at ~70 degrees.

settings.question: Where can I get support?
settings.answer: Email hello@momonaskin.com and we will be happy to support however we can!

settings.question: Is it baby/pregnancy-safe?
settings.answer: Yes! Super Tallow™ is safe to use during pregnancy, breastfeeding, and on your baby.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: We do! Please bear with us as we try to get international shipping rates down.

settings.question: How much should I use?
settings.answer: Email hello@momonaskin.com and we will be happy to support however we can!
